name: Debtorz "Business Debt Tracker"
desc: A production-ready debt management platform built from scratch. Features pixel-perfect UI, a local DB-powered chat system for team collaboration, and advanced financial analytics with robust security protocols.

name: CodeScrybe - Legacy Repo Chat AI
desc: Full-stack application featuring a RAG Pipeline for semantic analysis of legacy GitHub codebases. Utilizes Graph Databases to store and query code relationships. Built with React, Python, FastAPI, MongoDB, and Neo4J.

name: Flow Dash - Task Management
desc: A real-time project management application designed for team collaboration. Implemented using Next.js, MongoDB, and WebSockets to ensure instant updates and live synchronization across users.

name: Car Connect "Mobile App"
desc: Car Services & Product E-Commerce Two Interface (Merchant & Consumer) Flutter Application build using Flutter, Firebase, Nodejs and MongoDB

name: IRCTC Ticket Automation System
